strapiPost.title: Kickstart Your Thursdays With Breathwork & Flow Yoga At Red Barn
strapiPost.content:
Start your Thursday mornings with Breathwork & Flow Yoga at Red Barn Bentonville â€” Arkansas's first agri-hood, an agricultural-centered community just minutes from Downtown Bentonville.

  • Meditation: Every Thursday at 6a, join yoga instructor Sharlotte Fedewa at the barn for an hour of breathwork and meditation, and begin your day by activating your body's energy.
  • Caffeination: Stop by the Grange after the class and try a cup of Red Barn's farm-roasted coffee, ethically sourced and roasted on-site in a state-of-the-art, zero-emission Bellwether Roaster.

Everyone's first class is free. Find more info HERE.
